tweet: Some are commenting that it’s “extraordinary” that GEN Dunsford would publicly comment on LTC Vindman.   I disagree. This is what real loyalty looks like. Standing by someone who worked for you, who you know, and who is under fire. For good people, it ain’t hard.

Wow, this is something. General Dunford explicitly told reporters that he was going to disappear after retiring and keep out of the news. Breaks that in the first month, comes out and defends LTC Vindman from attacks led by Trump himself.

Gen Joe Dunford: “I have worked very closely with LTC Alexander Vindman. He’s professional, competent, patriotic and a loyal officer. He’s made an extraordinary contribution in peacetime and in combat.”

Gen Dunford defending LTC Vindman: “He was on all of my phone calls with my Russian counterpart Gen Gerasimov. He was a valued member of my staff. He spoke Russian fluently and was a competent action officer.” LTC Vindman worked for Dunford for years on Joint Staff prior to NSC.

Honored to have on the show today @kristen_fenty, Gold Star wife of LTC Joe Fenty, killed in Afghanistan in 2006. Readers of @THEOUTPOSTbook know the story of her and her husband’s service and sacrifice.
